data.name: Nikola Tesla
data.quote: The present is theirs; the future, for which I really worked, is mine.

data.name: Albert Einstein
data.quote: Imagination is more important than knowledge.

data.name: Isaac Newton
data.quote: If I have seen further than others, it is by standing upon the shoulders of giants.

data.name: Galileo Galilei
data.quote: You cannot teach a man anything; you can only help him find it within himself.

data.name: Marie Curie
data.quote: Be less curious about people and more curious about ideas.

data.name: Charles Darwin
data.quote: A man who dares to waste one hour of time has not discovered the value of life.

data.name: Stephen Hawking
data.quote: Intelligence is the ability to adapt to change.

data.name: Johannes Kepler
data.quote: Nature uses as little as possible of anything.

data.name: Thomas Edison
data.quote: Genius is one percent inspiration and ninety-nine percent perspiration.
